title: Rebuilding Guest Trust After Inconsistent Cocktails
system_mod: Focus on standardization, staff accountability, and guest-facing recovery strategies.
venue_context: Neighborhood cocktail bar that recently lost regulars due to sloppy, inconsistent drinks. Ownership wants to rebuild trust and win guests back.
prompt: Guests have been complaining about inconsistent cocktails and some regulars have stopped coming back. How do we reset standards and repair guest trust?
